title: Placements, is it better for newer players to wait for a few days/weeks?
body:
Did my placements last season mid-season and didn't get stomped like I have  done this season.

Last night went 1W and 4L as a support, not much I felt like I could have done differently but I wonder if the more hardcore players are all doing their placements right now and it's going to impact my placement or not? Would rather not be starting in bronze if I can help it, was Silver 2 last season ^^

Any advice appreciated :)

replies.body: welp if its any indicator, i got gold in preseason and got palced b1 so yeah id say wait

Look at this game, this is just a reason to not play.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/157168603/862635

I even declared intent to play zac, but it got banned.

If your going to play a lot through the season it shouldn't affect you too much though, but if your playing maybe 100 games over the season just wait for a bit.

It is best to wait ~3 weeks before doing placements, that way everything has settled down a little bit. People who have rushed into their placements have risen/fallen to where they should be starting and matchmaking is slightly more even.
